TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NaiveCalibratorEstimator extends Microsoft.ML.Calibrators.CalibratorEstimatorBase`1<class Microsoft.ML.Calibrators.NaiveCalibrator>
Public NotInheritable Class NaiveCalibratorEstimator Inherits CalibratorEstimatorBase(Of NaiveCalibrator)

Docs.remarks: It divides the range of the outputs into equally sized bins. In each bin, the probability of belonging to class 1, is the number of class 1 instances in the bin, divided by the total number of instances in the bin. For the usage pattern see the example in .

MemberSignature.Value: public NaiveCalibratorEstimator (Microsoft.ML.IHostEnvironment env, string labelColumn = "Label", string scoreColumn = "Score", string weightColumn = null);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Microsoft.ML.IHostEnvironment env, string labelColumn, string scoreColumn, string weightColumn) cil managed
Public Sub New (env As IHostEnvironment, Optional labelColumn As String = "Label", Optional scoreColumn As String = "Score", Optional weightColumn As String = null)

Docs.param: The label column name. This is consumed when this estimator is fit, but not consumed by the resulting transformer.
The score column name. This is consumed both when this estimator is fit and when the estimator is consumed.
The optional weight column name. Note that if specified this is consumed when this estimator is fit, but not consumed by the resulting transformer.
